scripts.start:client: cd client && npm run build && serve -s build
scripts.start:server: cd server && npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.build: start npm run build:client && start npm run build:server
scripts.serve: start npm run serve:client && start npm run serve:server
scripts.dev: start npm run dev:client && start npm run dev:server
scripts.start: npm run build:client && npm run build:server && npm run serve
